price: 39. A saaku (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) tu-siinih maxiqta siinit takke digaalál tangaleenim addunyal koroositteenimih sabbatah, diggah sin kee sin kataysis (sheetoona kinnuk) asaaku digaalál tangaleenih.
arabic: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِذ ظَّلَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walan yanfaʿakumu al-yawma idh ẓalamtum annakum fī al-ʿadhābi mush'tarikūna
